turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place an order from Starbucks on Chestnut Street in Philadelphia.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: May I get a venti caramel macchiato with nonfat milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti caramel macchiato with non fat milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on chestnut street in philadelphia, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it should be ready for pickup in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is it today. Thank you for your help.
